thread.title: Watch: Ants behave strangely around a ringing smartphone
thread.title_full: Watch: Ants behave strangely around a ringing smartphone

author: Deccan
title: Watch: Ants behave strangely around a ringing smartphone
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 03, 2015, 15.56 pm Ants are considered as one of the most intelligent living beings in the insect world and scientists are still investigating and have a lot to learn from their behavior. In the video below, you can see how ants behave strangely when they are around an electromagnetic radiation. In the video, an Apple iPhone was placed at a location frequented by a lot of ants. When the phone began ringing, the electromagnetic radiation from the phone makes the ants circle around the device in a strange fashion. Watch how they react to a ringing smartphone in their midst. It will remind you of your favorite cartoon with those tribal dances around a fire.
